name: Dino Run (ZX-Evolution)
description:
This is a ZX-Spectrum clone game. Support platforms: ZX-Evolution (Baseconf), ATM-Turbo 2+, Pentagon 2.666.

Or you can download the emulator with the game on you PC. Just unpack, run the file DINORUN.BAT, and enjoy! :)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You must lead Dino, through a dangerous valley. The game is gradually accelerating, there are new opponents and obstacles.

There are two modes in the game:
1 - Full story
2 - Best result

Good luck!
